channel.title: Teleports?

item.title: Teleports?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I’m assuming that’s the teleport method that actually handles the teleporting of players. In which case, is going to keep moving your player. You need to create either a duplicate method or a flag within that method to decide whether to or not to move the player to the new location

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports?
item.dc:creator: @balaney balaney
item.description:
@balaney wrote:

:mad:
I am trying to code a teleport, characters will do the animation but it will not actually teleport the player.

if (command[0].equals("modzone")) { TeleportHandler.telePlayer(player, 1868, 5347, 0, 0, 1, true); }

PLEASE HELP

Read full topic
